```{r setup}
library(ncodeR)

# Individual Pieces
data(RS.data)
rs_text = RS.data$text
```

## Create Code
```{r}
newcode = create.code(name = "Data", expressions = c("number","data"), excerpts = rs_text)
```

## Handcode 4 excerpts
```{r}
# newcode.h = handcode(code = newcode, excerpts = rs_text, n = 4)
```
